item.title: Write out in the open
item.description: My need for ‘A Site Four Sore Eyes’ This is place where I can publish my ideas for the audience of me. I have an ever growing number of thixotropic reasons for setting up this platform. Probably the greatest overarching rationale to give me a place where I can get the persistent ruminations out of my head and put them out in the public domain so I can read them with fresher or simply differently focused eyes.
